attributes.action: Allow the RNLI and other voluntary emergency services be exempt from Ofcoms charges on VHF radios.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the RNLI are a voluntary organisation with funds contributed by the general public the organisation should be exempt from radio operators licence fees.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
